author: ryanleeschneider
content: I vaguely remember there being some writeups around why the blob replacement fee was raised to 100%, am I thinking of Peter's PR to geth (https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/26940) or is there something more "article-y" I can point people to that have questions around this?  Also I assume it'd be a generally bad idea for someone to change the price bump value on their local node, in that since all the ELs I checked at least default to a 100% price bump lowering the value in my local node would just result in my replacement tx never getting propagated to blobk builders, right?
